data.text: @BiancaAustin90 I still tested positive 10 days later. Lines were stronger then than earlier on. I'm.not convinced on the strength of the lines etc
@BiancaAustin90 I hope you get better soon
@BiancaAustin90 I had that for ten days it’s horrible the good news is your be stronger after it . Get Netflix on B and put your feet up . Your be better for Saturday and chazs hat trick .
@BiancaAustin90 Mine lasted for 10 days! I was so pissed off! Hopefully yours won’t last too much longer
@BiancaAustin90 Keep going B, frustrating I know xx #bloodycovid
@BiancaAustin90 Knowing a few people who have had it recently and this is quite common a few days after testing positive
@BiancaAustin90 Hang on in there.  It feels forever but it will be over.  Once you’ve done ten days even if testing positive you can end isolation xx
@BiancaAustin90 I know it’s difficult but you have to have patience. You can’t rush recovery from Covid.
